fields.description: K* is an instance-based classifier, that is the class of a test instance is based upon the class of those training instances similar to it, as determined by some similarity function. It differs from other instance-based learners in that it uses an entropy-based distance function.
fields.name: K* (WEKA-KStar)
Parameters
fields.description:
-B <num>
  Manual blend setting (default 20%)
 
 -E
  Enable entropic auto-blend setting (symbolic class only)
 
 -M <char>
  Specify the missing value treatment mode (default a)
  Valid options are: a(verage), d(elete), m(axdiff), n(ormal)
